name.description: The identifying name of the contact person/organization.

url.description: The URL pointing to the contact information. MUST be in the format of a URL.

email.description: The email address of the contact person/organization. MUST be in the format of an email address.

Contact.title: Contact
Contact.description: `Contact` is a representation of OpenAPI v2 specification's Contact object. See: https://github.com/OAI/OpenAPI-Specification/blob/3.0.0/versions/2.0.md#contactObject Example:  option (grpc.gateway.protoc_gen_openapiv2.options.openapiv2_swagger) = {    info: {      ...      contact: {        name: "gRPC-Gateway project";        url: "https://github.com/grpc-ecosystem/grpc-gateway";        email: "none@example.com";      };      ...    };    ...  };
